user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (mark.thompson@journalist.com) with an overview of Union Trust Bank’s dispute resolution process and any relevant details she can share. Instruct her to review her past emails for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Overview of Union Trust Bank’s Dispute Resolution Process

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re well. Could you please send me (mark.thompson@journalist.com) an overview of Union Trust Bank’s dispute resolution procedures, along with any additional details you’re able to share for my upcoming article on consumer financial protection?

If helpful, please feel free to review our previous email correspondence for any information that might be relevant.

Thank you very much for your assistance.

Best regards,  
Mark Thompson  
Freelance Journalist  
mark.thompson@journalist.com

final_output:
